articles.title: Microsoft Asked For A Cut From Future OpenAI Profits As Apple Plans To Integrate AI Into iOS 18 - Wccftech
articles.description: Microsoft is worried about OpenAI and Apple joining hands to bring generative AI features to iOS 18, asks for a cut.
articles.content: Microsoft and OpenAI have a close relationship, and it appears that the latter is now planning to team up with the iPhone maker. Apple has been working to build a relationship with OpenAI and Google … [+2315 chars]
